body: Maybe. I'd argue that if users do `as_tensor(something)`, they usually don't know (or didn't bother to figure out) if `something` is a tensor or not, in which case they certainly wouldn't be thinking to themselves "hmm the gradients will glowing back through here, and then ....".
body_html: Maybe. I'd argue that if users do as_tensor(something), they usually don't know (or didn't bother to figure out) if something is a tensor or not, in which case they certainly wouldn't be thinking to themselves "hmm the gradients will glowing back through here, and then ....".
body_text: Maybe. I'd argue that if users do as_tensor(something), they usually don't know (or didn't bother to figure out) if something is a tensor or not, in which case they certainly wouldn't be thinking to themselves "hmm the gradients will glowing back through here, and then ....".
